paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.demographics: 2 sporadic breast cancer patients, 1 hepatocellular carcinoma patient

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Interestingly, we also found that the BRCA2 c.7409dup was harbored in two unrelated sporadic breast cancer patients and one hepatocellular carcinoma patient.

variants.segregation_data: Segregates with disease in affected individuals.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple affected individuals.
variants.additional_notes: This variant has been previously reported in familial breast and/or ovarian cancer.
key_quotes: Interestingly, we also found that the BRCA2 c.7409dup was harbored in two unrelated sporadic breast cancer patients and one hepatocellular carcinoma patient.

patients.demographics: 1 hepatocellular carcinoma patient with a family history of breast cancer

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Moreover, BRCA2 c.4307T>C occurred in a hepatocellular carcinoma patient with a family history of breast cancer.
